column5: Just wondering if any members are experiencing problems sending/receiving e-mail? I gave up waiting on the 310 surf helpline.
Mine is working fine. Try going to hotmail and logging in with your sympatico address.
My business is on Bellnet, basically the same thing.  It is working.  Although I do get the odd hickup every month or so.
"The Bell Sympatico email service is currently experiencing technical difficulties. We are working to restore this service and apologize for any inconvenience. Thank you for your patience. "
Bell/Sympatico is having server problems - email in some areas is down. I'm in 819 and the problem started around 10:00 AM yesterday and is still down for sending - receiving is OK.
